helpText: Specify what kind of item this is in the GRX backend (essentially MTX/EA Marketplace). Note that you can specify this without adding it to marketplace (it will be a warning but the game will run).
The string ref used for communicating with EA Marketplace. This must much the alias" in the Economy Manager."
A list of other item flavors to tag this item flavor with.
A list of data for each tier of the badge. Must not be empty.
Only the '_empty' flavor should have this checked.
If checked this badge will not appear in menus while locked
This toggles the tooltip display to say Account or Character Badge
